text: Hi everyone, I was wondering if there is an easy way to add classes to the following code: {% module "section_1_button" path="@HubSpot/button" label="Section 1 Button", link={ "url": { "type": "EXTERNAL", "href": "<https://dummylink.com>", "content_id": null }, "open_in_new_tab": false, "no_follow": false }, button_text="Join us now", no_wrapper=True %}.
Is there any way to stage blog pages?
Hi there.  We have a couple questions on the email feedback events API...

for the 'user' field, the description on the HubSpot API reads: "The email address of the user who submitted the unbounce request."  Is there a possibility that could be an email address NOT within the HubSpot organization _or_ the company that is requesting the marketing emails be sent out?
Same question for the 'requestedBy' field... "The email address of the person requesting the change on behalf of the recipient. If not applicable, this property is omitted."

The HubSpot forms rendered on the cms pages are coming with styles and classes (like form-columns-0). Is there any way to remove these instead of having to override everything with own classes? I tried the option to render raw html but this doesn’t seem to change anything..
Unfortunately the blog does not have staging

Hi,
Does anyone know why private app creation isn't available on developer accounts?
Hi everyone @here, is there a way to create a live rss feed but just for the landing pages? Thanks in advance for all your help.

Hello there, I’m storing a JSON string in a contact property, that I’m trying to use in a email module. Trying to parse it with | fromjson, with | escapejson, and its not working. It is very weird cos if I copy and paste the string on the HubSpot module it does work and fromjson parses the string, but when I call it from the variable (the contact property) it does not work. Any ideas of what can be happening?

You cannot currently access all of these contact variables via emails. However — there is a new beta that you can enable that will allow you to grab this info. From your module in Design Tools enable this feature and it should work.
Spent too much time a week or so ago tyring to get something similar to work only to find out it was solved by toggling this on…
Hahaha yea spent a solid 5 hours on something that should have only taken 1 just crying because of this inconsistency. Happy my suffering can help! hahaha
yeah, I spent at least 2 or 3 hours!
I’m glad I asked here! thank you!!!
